entry.title: In 1959, what Bertrand Russell said to the furture people

link.title: In 1959, what Bertrand Russell said to the furture people

entry.summary:
I should like to say two things, one intellectual and one moral:
The intellectual thing I should want to say to them is this: When you are studying any matter or considering any philosophy, ask yourself only what are the facts and what is the truth that the facts bear out. Never let yourself be diverted either by what you wish to believe or by what you think would have beneficent socia...
